loot.name: time coins
description: Used in one quest. Can be traded for colonial marks. Randomized hue.

loot.name: time vases
description: Can be traded for colonial marks. Randomized hue.

loot.name: time reagents
description: Can be traded for colonial marks. Randomized hue.

loot.name: a temporal imprint
description: Used to create time menageries. These can drop off any monster in the entire dungeon.

loot.name: a blackrock fragment
description: Used to create time menageries. Not confirmed but likely higher drop rate off Blackrock Elementals.

loot.name: infinity coin
description: Exchange these for items at the vendor in Colony.

loot.name: a colony gate pass
description: Required to access shortcuts to and from Colony. A reward for turning in a bounty notice at Colony.

loot.name: a tablet fragment
description: Gargish tablets related to the Red Doors on Level 2. Found on corpses of random encounters.

loot.name: a clump of offal
description: The offal emits a powerful and terrible stench.

loot.name: a hunk of vile muscle
description: The chunk of meat is crawling with maggots.

loot.name: a segment of silk stolen from navrey night-eyes
description: This silk is so strong it simply cannot be cut!
